<h3 id="X39891">X(39891) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st JOHNSON-YFF TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^6-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a^4+(b^2+c^2)*(b+c)^2*a^2-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39891) = 2*X(611)-3*X(11237)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39891) lies on these lines: {1,18440}, {4,39897}, {5,39901}, {6,10895}, {12,6776}, {55,1503}, {56,1352}, {65,39885}, {69,7354}, {141,5204}, {159,9659}, {193,5229}, {388,5921}, {495,39900}, {499,18358}, {511,12943}, {518,36971}, {542,611}, {613,3818}, {1351,3585}, {1428,10516}, {1469,9657}, {1478,3564}, {1479,39884}, {1836,5847}, {3056,12953}, {3085,39874}, {3304,12589}, {3416,37567}, {3614,3618}, {5050,7951}, {5432,25406}, {5434,11180}, {5848,12763}, {9578,39878}, {9654,39899}, {9655,11898}, {9658,37488}, {10483,33878}, {10519,15326}, {10590,14912}, {10797,39872}, {10831,39879}, {10873,39882}, {10923,39887}, {10924,39888}, {10944,39889}, {10956,39902}, {10957,39903}, {11375,39870}, {11392,39871}, {11501,39877}, {11670,32261}, {11869,39880}, {11870,39881}, {11905,39886}, {11930,39895}, {11931,39896}, {13897,19145}, {13954,19146}, {14927,15338}, {14982,32243}, {16475,17605}, {19027,39875}, {19028,39876}, {19470,32306}, {22759,39883}, {24248,29235}, {35800,39893}, {35801,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39891) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (55, 12588), (39900, 495)<br>
X(39891) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 18440, 39892), (388, 5921, 39873), (613, 3818, 10896), (3056, 36990, 12953)<br>
</p>
